title: I Made A Tribute To Off-Meta Picks!
body:
I know these aren't way off but I couldn't play league and I had these clips and this song was stuck in my head and... it inspired me to throw everything I had together. 

So here it is:

http://youtu.be/wxJ_hAI2H_0

[Reddit link](http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2efdzh/offmeta_montage_read_the_comments_for_more_info/)

I posted this on Reddit but I'll post it here again:

I tend to pick a lot of things that don't fit into the Meta and I get a lot of flame for that so... I picked this song because I thought it symbolized when you do pick a role or champion that isn't in the current Meta and people just rage and yell at you but you plug your ears and you go, "La La La!" and then you carry them! So don't be afraid to try new things but at the same time don't rage at people and stay calm and remember to always have fun!

replies.body: I absolutely love jungle Diana. It's so strong.

Glad to see someone else enjoys Diana Jungle. I faced it once and it completely wrecked my face... I was so shocked and surprised that the person got a Feral Flare and was doing so well and dealing so much... I had to try it for my self. Now I'm in love with it.
I actually don't go FF when I play her, I go standard AP Diana and build a Spirit of the Spectral Wraith from my Machete.
I kind of guessed you didn't. Most people don't but after what I experienced I had to try it for my self!
I might have to try that build then... is the rest of FF Diana's build standard AP or do you go AD?
After FF you build normal, AP. I don't get my E till level 7 and don't gank until then either. Then I murder!
Diana in most lanes are strong imo.
When I was a young summoner, I used to think that Diana was meant for jungle
Now that "think" HAS TURNED INTO A "KNOW!"

You will not earn my upvotes without AD Malzahar >:[

Jungle Syndra almost forced my hand, tho.

I have an entire game of AD Malzahar recorded... There just wasn't enough time in the song... Up-vote and I PROMISE THEE! if This gets 20 up-votes (minimum) then I shall add AD Malzahar in my second one!

Edit: I should clarify that I want 20 up-votes not for just AD Malzahar but to make another one at all. Because if no one is interested what's the point?

The blood pact has been made.

BRETHREN! COME UPVOTE THIS MAN'S WORK SO THAT HE MIGHT SHOW THE WORLD THE MIGHT OF OUR SPACE-CRAB ARMY!

EDIT: The upvotes have been made. たのむぜ, UnknownMartian-さん。

I started working on a new one before this got to even 10 and now it's at Sixteen! The new one just finished uploading, It is jungle Tristana. I wouldn't consider this one an actual video, I was just practicing some stuff but I'll post it soon. The blood pact stays true though! Once this hits 20 AD Malzahar, Jungle Vel'koz and Jungle Jinx will be in the next one (someone from Tumblr was upset that those weren't included)!

word

Edit: Btw that Syndra game was ridiculously long and I had nearly 30 kills. How ever I didn't think people would've liked the Syndra jungle much and would've thought I was merely copying Keyori or something so I limited the Syndra clips to a very low amount. So next one I'll throw in some more cool Syndra jungle clips and AD Malzahar!
This was so cool! First, I love that song. Second, Syndra jungle was beast. O.O Stunz for dayz.
THANKS MAN : D! I'm glad to hear you liked it! I loved the song too, it was stuck in my head too long for me not to do this. Make sure to share dis wit all yo frands!
http://37.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lxzace7JGY1rn95k2o1_400.gif
I just have one question...where's the little picture in the link to this? It's a little boy looking up at a wall...?

It's a little thing my friend made for me: [here is the link!](http://i.imgur.com/xGuQ23C.png)

Edit: It was a joke thing because I'm known as Deli and my IGN is UnknownMartian, So... connect the dots!
Bless people who go against the meta and infuse variety and diversity into a game. I mostly go with un-meta supports, but I've definitely been there as well.
My favorite supports are Brand and Vel'Koz
We've hit 20 Up-Votes and half a K views. Thanks everyone!
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAND, that's 20 Up-Votes!
You should try out full AD udyr (maxing tiger). He does more damage than lee, because im pretty sure lee cant kill a jungler with just 4-5 basic attacks.
I did that and guess who I had to face in top lane... Yeap, It was Satan himself!
Was he as evil as usual?
You should have heard the Skype call.
I try all sorts of off-meta supports, but the only off-meta junglers I've tried (with success) was Diana and AD Malzahar. So much fun when the opponents aren't quite sure how to handle it.

As stated before I played every champion in the jungler role. Speaking of such I was playing around with the zooming in and the shaking on drops with a jungle Tristana video, I'll post that soon. Prepare thy eyes!

mhm. But then again I dislike the nid play at the end... Typical of me.

Otherwise, great video! I like it!

Really... That's interesting most people liked/loved the Nidalee play at the end! It sure was my favorite part! 

I'm glad to hear, but guys don't forget to also like it on the YouTube page to show support!

It is turely funny when you go against the meta in normals. Meta doesn't seem to matter much to the pros but when you get people who want to be a pro and follow the meta thats when it gets to this way. Went and faced a Yasuo with a Swain the other day. Loved the out come. Yasuo has proven a really good match up against a lot of **meta** champs but because of my ult and abilities he couldn't even scratch my turrent. Took 2 to 3 ganks with sometimes more than 2 people to get me, lol. I mean Swain is OP but he is weak to most other champs like Ahri, Malzahar, Veigar, etc. So it was just too funny to see him put up "Swains ult needs an nerf" more than once. True though his ult is crazy but it drains his mana drastically. And to think his ult was no better with the constant wind gusts and ults he did i had to use mine more than wanted.
Awesome video! Keep it up!
Thanks!
Have you ever known the fear that is AP xin jungle?  He can take towers without minions and can heal through anything you throw at him, he is also impossible to 1vs1
What if I told you... AP Xin barely made it into this video? ***wiggles eyebrows***

Well it would make since if he was. Every time I say I am going ap xin jungle by team gets all suspicious and saying I am a troll, but then later in the match when I am 11/3 they suddenly are agreeing with me that ap xin is broken
We've hit 100 views!
